meanings.definition: A sweet mixture of egg whites and sugar, beaten until stiff and baked until crisp.
meanings.sent1: The baker carefully piped the meringue onto the pie before baking it.
meanings.sent2: The lemon meringue pie was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to sculpt a meringue snowman out of the dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and airy as a perfectly whipped meringue.
meanings.sent5: The meringue on top of the cake glistened like freshly fallen snow.

meanings.definition: A light, fluffy dessert made from this mixture.
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed a variety of colorful meringues in their window.
meanings.sent2: She savored every bite of the chocolate meringue.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy meringue seemed to dance on the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The meringue dessert was a cloud of sweetness in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The delicate meringue melted on her tongue like a sugary dream.
